name: CLRegion
desc: A base class representing an area that can be monitored.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The identifier for the region object.

items.name: var notifyOnEntry: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating that notifications are generated upon entry into the region.

items.name: var notifyOnExit: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating that notifications are generated upon exit from the region.

items.name: enum CLRegionState
items.desc: Constants that reflect the relationship of the current location to the region boundaries.
